participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Curious and nurturing, Emily enjoys sharing her passion for music with others while also engaging with her community.
participant_1.background: i enjoy exploring new parts of the city. i volunteer at the homeless shelter. i'm a piano teacher on the side. my father played violin professionally. i play several instruments.

participant_2.name: Carlos
participant_2.personality: Creative and adventurous, Carlos finds joy in cooking and exploring his heritage through culinary arts.
participant_2.background: i'm a descendant of christopher columbus. i love to cook paella. i've a weakness for fish and chips. i visit europe twice a year. i am an art major in college.
